scripts.go-setup: go get github.com/golang/protobuf/proto && go get google.golang.org/grpc
scripts.js-setup-grpc: npm i && npm install --save grpc@1.21.1 --runtime=electron --target=1.4.0 && ./node_modules/.bin/electron-rebuild && npm run proto
scripts.start: ./node_modules/livescript/bin/lsc -o build -c -b --no-header -d renderer.ls fifo-pipe.ls && lsc -c index.ls && electron .
